cpl.author: kl
cpl.description: A button to put the open tab to the left
cpl.name: LeftOpenTab
cpl.readme:
!! 左置开启标签页

A button to put the [[Open|$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open]] tab to the left. Click the button again to restore to the default position.

!! Settings

{{$:/plugins/xp/leftopentab/settings}}

!! See also

TWaddle's  [[LeftBar|http://leftbar.tiddlyspot.com/]] plugin
cpl.title: $:/plugins/xp/leftopentab
title: xp/leftopentab
